column7: the Bureau of Investigation at the Ministry of Immigration procedure received a  29-year-old Chinese national QIN ZI YUAN
column8: from the police force in Daun Penh district.------The lady had been disturbing the peace and making a scene when she was picked up by the cops------It was established that she came to Cambodia on August 26
column10: through Phnom Penh International Airport------Since then she has had no job and no regular place to stay along with no passport. She also was acting strangley and claiming to be God.------She was detained and sent to the General Department of Immigration to carry out the proceedings of the law.------http://cambodiapolice.com/policekh/114932
